metadata.Title: CVE-2020-0306 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low.
metadata.Description: In LLVM, there is a possible ineffective stack cookie placement due to stack frame double reservation. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-11Android ID: A-139666480

notes.Note: sbeattie> possibly a weak hardening measure allowing easier exploitation, and not a vulnerability in and of itself. But clarity is needed.

criterions.comment: llvm-toolchain-10 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
llvm-toolchain-11 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
llvm-toolchain-8 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
llvm-toolchain-9 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
